courses.name: Blog Title
courses.desc: An Ai Tool that generates Titles based on the content
courses.aiprompt: Give me 5 blog topics in bullet wise only based on given niche and outline topic and give me result in rich text editor format

courses.name: Insta Hashtags
courses.desc: An Ai Tool that generates Hashtags based on the input
courses.aiprompt: Give me 10 top hashtags  on given niche topic and give me result in rich text editor format

courses.name: Caption Generator
courses.desc: An Ai Tool that generates caption for your social media posts
courses.aiprompt: Give me 5 different captions in bullet wise only based on given niche and some outline give me result in rich text editor format

form.label: What type of caption do u want
form.name: niche

form.label: if u could give more info (optional)
form.name: outline

courses.name: Code Generator
courses.desc: An Ai Tool that can generate a code for given language
courses.aiprompt: Generate only code for the given niche in the given language

form.label: Which code would u like me to generate today
form.name: niche

form.label: Enter the language in which u want the code
form.name: language
